description:
Ever wonder what the 100% in the title means? Probably not, but you`re getting an answer anyway! Find out what happens when the hitherto nonexistent meter above Pascal`s head drops to 0%! Meanwhile, a fierce final showdown is fought against not-Gollum on not-Mount-Doom, and the resident delinquent takes a stab at 1% Pascal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 仰天! 0%パスカル先生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
